articles.title: Palaeontologists find over 42,000-year-old Asia’s largest lair for cave hyena - WION
articles.description: Palaeontologists find over 42,000-year-old Asia’s largest lair for cave hyena
articles.content: Siberian locals discovered a prehistoric lair of cave hyenas, which palaeontologists believe is the largest ancient hyena lair ever found in Asia. The cave in question is located in Khakassia, the Ru… [+2395 chars]

articles.content:
TOKYO -- Scientific experiments from researchers around the world have started on China's Tiangong space station, part of Beijing's bid to appeal to the global scientific community.
